Description: Beautifully updated 3 bed 2 bath in Brookline. Water included, laundry in unit and central AC along with hardwood floors and tons of natural lighting throughout! Modern eat-in kitchen with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and built-in microwave. Large bedrooms with great closet space and separate living room. 1 garage parking spot included. Great location just a walk to the Green Line with easy access to Cleveland Circle, Washington Sq. and Coolidge Corner! Video tour available upon request*
